17  
18  package org.apache.log4j.spi;
19  
20  import java.net.URL;
21  
22  /**
23     Implemented by classes capable of configuring log4j using a URL.
24     
25     @since 1.0
26     @author Anders Kristensen
27   */
28  public interface Configurator {
29  
30    /**
31       Special level value signifying inherited behaviour. The current
32       value of this string constant is <b>inherited</b>. {@link #NULL}
33       is a synonym.  */
34    public static final String INHERITED = "inherited";
35  
36    /**
37       Special level signifying inherited behaviour, same as {@link
38       #INHERITED}. The current value of this string constant is
39       <b>null</b>. */
40    public static final String NULL = "null";
41  
42  
43  
44    /**
45       Interpret a resource pointed by a URL and set up log4j accordingly.
46  
47       The configuration is done relative to the <code>hierarchy</code>
48       parameter.
49  
50       @param url The URL to parse
51       @param repository The hierarchy to operation upon.
52     */
53    void doConfigure(URL url, LoggerRepository repository);
54  }
